stories.title: Talos the Soldier
stories.description: Recounts how Talos the Soldier and the Avatar became fast friends.

stories.title: Friend of Merchants
stories.description: How the merchant guild helped the Avatar in his quest.

stories.title: The Lost Ring
stories.description: In which the Avatar loses the holy ring near the Hanging Tree.

stories.title: The Holy Mountain
stories.description: Tells of the seven trials the Avatar faced in Smidge Ridge.
stories.upon_hearing: I want to climb Smidge Ridge and better understand the Avatar!

stories.title: The Fearful Book
stories.description: How the Avatar destroyed an deceitful book and its treacherous author.
stories.upon_hearing: How fearsome! I will be vigilant to destroy any duplicitous books I find.

stories.title: Fellowship of the Avatar
stories.description: Recalls how the Avatar formed an adventuring party and ventured forth.

texts: The bard's tales have inspired me! I want to be just like Talos the soldier!
I want to seek the holy ring in the fields of Hanging Tree!
I will undertake the trials of Smidge Ridge just like the avatar!
[portrait bard]Okay, I'll come back to the mission.
I don't have any bards to send there.
I've already sent someone to {townName}. I should call him back before I send someone else.
